hero.title1: The era of learning to code is over.
hero.slogan: Your vibe is the new code.
hero.description2: just describe your idea to AI and launch your app in 6 weeks.

whyVibeCoding.subtitle: In the AI era, the way we read and write code is fundamentally changing.

0.title: From Idea to Implementation
0.description: The time from idea to code is dramatically shortened. What used to take weeks can now be done in hours. Vibe coding bridges the gap between thought and implementation.

1.title: Intent-Driven Development
1.description: The key is clearly communicating intent, not memorizing syntax. The ability to express 'what you want to build' becomes a new development skill. Prompt writing becomes as important as coding.

2.title: Becoming a Creator
2.description: Shift from consumer to producer, from tool user to tool maker. Create your own solutions, modify as needed, and extend as you wish.

3.title: The Essence of AI Collaboration
3.description: Learn to treat AI as a collaboration partner, not just a tool. Understanding AI's strengths, compensating for its weaknesses, and combining it with human creative judgment is the key to the next era.

dojoSystem.subtitle: Structured curriculum, fellow practitioners, belt progression system

0.title: 6-Step Structured Curriculum
0.description: Master everything about vibe coding step by step, from beginner to advanced. Each part builds on the previous, culminating in real projects.

1.title: Growing Together
1.description: You don't learn alone. Ask questions, review code, and exchange feedback with fellow learners who share the same goals.

2.title: Belt Progression System
2.description: A 9-stage journey from white belt to black belt. Earn XP to advance your belt and see your ranking in the dojo.

3.title: Project-Focused Learning
3.description: Theory alone isn't enough. Build portfolio sites, games, bots, and full-stack apps to prove your skills.

projects.subtitle: Not just theory. Learn by building real, working projects.

0.title: Portfolio Website
0.description: Create and deploy your personal branding site.

1.title: Browser Game
1.description: Build interactive games with HTML5 Canvas.

2.title: Landing Page
2.description: Create marketing pages to promote products or services.

3.title: Discord/Slack Bot
3.description: Develop automation bots for your community.

4.title: Full-Stack Web App
4.description: Build web applications with database and authentication.

5.title: CLI Tool
5.description: Create command-line tools to automate your work.

6.title: API Server
6.description: Design RESTful APIs and build backend servers.

7.title: Chrome Extension
7.description: Build browser extensions that expand functionality.

8.title: Web3 DApp
8.description: Enter the world of blockchain, NFTs, and smart contracts.

characters.title: Your Training Character
characters.subtitle: Choose from 32 animal characters and start your training at the dojo

quote.text1: What you learn at VibeKai is not coding skills.
quote.text2: It's the power to turn thoughts into reality
quote.author: — VibeKai Training Philosophy
quote.description1: Beyond a simple learning space, we're building a
quote.description3: where vibe coders grow and connect together.
